front.title: Closing the RTP Payload Format Media Types IANA Registry

abstract.t: A number of authors of RTP Payload Formats and the WG process have failed to ensure that the media types for RTP payload formats is registred in the IANA registry "RTP Payload Formats Media Types" as recommended by RFC 8088. To simplify the process and rely only on the media types registry this document closes the RTP payload specific registry. In addition it updates the instruction to payload format authors in RFC 8088 to reflect this change.
